topic.title: How to move information of sites to new other ZeroNet
topic.body:
I used ZeroNet 0.6.2. So I updated to 0.6.3. But, I can't run the new Zeronet.
Because I installed 0.6.3 manually again.
If this goes on, previous sites' data is not read. So I move /date to new Zeronet.
But, I can't run new Zeronet.

How can I reflect past information?
Also, can I use the same ZeroID between different devices?

1604066846_mirrored_nagiept_github.body:
OK. I confirmed that ZeroNet started. (Because ZeroHello isn't opened automatically, I might not have not noticed.)
However, ZeroHello was opened in its initial state. Unlike before, the list of sites I visited was not displayed.
In addition, when I opened ZeroMe, ZeroNet doesn't start.
New log: https://drive.google.com/open?id=1LHLJSeXFHKIpY9Tt5xZ0Uh2QR4vffxB-

OMG! I seem to have lost old users.json and sites.json.
But, ZeroNet started normally.
I don't have a problem if be able to use my ZeroID.
Is it possible?
I sent a mail to you.
